title: Hello, I have purchased your equipment on AliExpress website, but I am not sure that it is official,
content:
Hello, I have purchased your equipment on AliExpress website, but I am not sure that it is official, not fake and not restored.
I need confirmation, I need a list of official distributors and sellers of your stores in China, and please check if AliExpress and this V-Phone Store are included.
https://s.click.aliexpress.com/e/clc1pjPk to the list of official suppliers of your products is it genuine and new?
